items.sentence: Don\'t forget to open the window in your room.
Don\'t leave any valuables in your hotel room.
Even though he apologized, I\'m still furious.
Tell me if there\'s anything I can do to help.
Do you want us to take you back to your house?
I don\'t know if he will visit us next Sunday.
I don\'t know if you knew that already or not.
I don\'t know when Tom bought that dictionary.
If you see Tom, tell him I\'m looking for him.
It\'s getting late, so we\'d better get going.
Tom says he\'s lived in Boston his whole life.
Tom says that Mary can go, but that he can\'t.
Tom says that he doesn\'t feel like going out.
Tom was Mary\'s boyfriend before she met John.
Tom was hanged for a murder he didn\'t commit.
Tom wanted to hide the money from his ex-wife.
Tom wants to buy a house in this neighborhood.
Tom was a bit surprised by what Mary told him.
Tom was killed in an accident three years ago.
Tom was satisfied with the work Mary had done.
